item.title: about me
item.description: My resume can be downloaded in a PDF format here. education Bachelor of Applied Science in Honors Mechatronics Engineering University of Waterloo Co-operative Program Graduated in April 2022 skills the languages i’ve worked with (from most experience to least experience) are C# C++ C Python Java Go HTML, CSS, XML Javascript SQL YAML the frameworks and libraries I’ve used are Unity NUnit testNG Azure Jenkins Ansible Hugo Jekyll Latex some of my other sills include

item.title: fun stuff i'm working on
item.description: If you want to check out some of the code I’ve written, check out my Github profile. Custom Smart Home System This project aims to use primarily Arduino to create a customized, cost effective smart home, with the goal of being energy efficient and secure. Personal Website The latest iteration of my personal website (the one you’re reading right now!) was created using the Hugo framework. ideas without borders During the second half of my undergrad, I was involved in Engineers Without Borders on their podcast portfolio to create ideas without borders.

item.title: get in touch
item.description: The best way to contact me is through email. You can reach me at camille -dot- h -dot- walters -at- gmail -dot- com Alternatively, you can find me on LinkedIn here.
